bill_title: appropriate money for the Campbell County Family Meats Processing Plant.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money for the Campbell County Family Meats Processing Plant. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of one hundred fifty thousand dollars ($150,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, for the planning, design, construction, and all aspects of development of the Campbell County Family Meats Processing Plant at Herreid, South Dakota. Section 2. The amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2005, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
